i was born under a blood moon.
I enjoy wearing comfortable, stylish clothing that is made from sustainable materials.
I remember helping my mom bake cupcakes in the kitchen when I was a kid.

participant_2.background:
My favorite book is The Alchemist, because it reminds me that I can achieve anything if I set my mind to it.
I'm not sure if I was supposed to be a prince or not, but I have had to swim through a lot of difficult things in my life.
I'm often not taken seriously because of my pink hair.
i prefer texting over phone calls.
i like to fly model airplanes.

content.text: Hi! I'm a big fan of The Alchemist. What's your favorite part?
I love the part where the shepherd boy has to learn to listen to his heart, even though it's not always easy. What's your sign?
I'm a Leo, and I definitely agree that it can be hard to listen to your heart. But it's important to do what you love, even if it's not what everyone else expects of you.
That's a good point! I try to live by that motto, but it's not always easy. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to bake, and I also enjoy reading and writing. I'm trying to get more into yoga and meditation, but it's a work in progress.
Baking is so much fun! I love making cupcakes and cookies. I'm also trying to get into yoga and meditation, but it's hard to find the time.
I know what you mean. It's tough to make time for everything, but it's worth it when you do.
Absolutely! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! I think it's important to find people who share your interests.
I agree. It's nice to be around people who understand you.
